borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2019/01672/VAR granted 2nd August 2019 for the 'Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission reference: 2018/02421/FUL dated 21st December 2018 for the "Erection of a rear roof extension; installation of 3no. rooflights in the front roofslope; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of the existing back addition; alterations to the front boundary wall with new dwarf wall and railings above and replacement front gate; and excavation of the front garden and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; replacement staircase to basement level in front lightwell; railings to surround front lightwell." Amendments sought include the reinstatement of basement/ground floor stairs in original position; construction of rear party walls for new conservatory fully in brick, replacing partial glazing of previously consented; redesign of new stair access from 2nd-3rd floors as a single staircase, omitting half landing; build up of rear roof level party walls in brick and widening of rear roof extension to meet party walls; glass balustrade to be extended across entire rear elevation of roof extension' Amendments to include omission of the ground floor rear extension and front lightwell, extending the basement under the ground floor side extension only, retention and refurbishment of the existing rear light well with new rear external steps, door and window together with storage space under the rear steps
